name: An epic around the island tour.
description: As a tourist the best way to enjoy your vacation is to explore as a local. Experience the food and culture, go to one place to another without carrying all the maps from your hotel and  worst getting lost. In this triip your not just tourists but a friend visiting. This trip is a combination of culture and history, the stunning view other experiences is just a bonus. This beautiful island has a lot to offer so sit back and relax and let us do all the work. So what are we waiting for? Lets make this vacation a triip you will never forget:).
